Name: Estimated Number of Cells
Description: The number of barcodes estimated to correspond to GEMs containing cells. See VDJ Cell Calling Algorithm.

Name: Mean Read Pairs per Cell
Description: Number of input read pairs divided by the estimated number of cells.

Name: Number of Cells With Productive V-J Spanning Pair
Description: Number of cell barcodes for which at least one productive sequence was found for each of TRA and TRB (or heavy and light chains, for Ig).

Name: Number of Read Pairs
Description: Total number of read pairs that were assigned to this library in demultiplexing.

Name: Valid Barcodes
Description: Fraction of reads with barcodes that match the whitelist after barcode correction.

Name: Q30 Bases in Barcode
Description: Fraction of cell barcode bases with Q-score ≥ 30.

Name: Q30 Bases in RNA Read 1
Description: Fraction of read 1 bases with Q-score ≥ 30. (Likewise for read 2.)

Name: Q30 Bases in Sample Index
Description: Fraction of sample index bases with Q-score ≥ 30.

Name: Q30 Bases in UMI
Description: Fraction of UMI bases with Q-score ≥ 30.

Name: Reads Mapped to Any V(D)J Gene
Description: Fraction of reads that partially or wholly map to a V(D)J gene segment.

Name: Reads Mapped to TRA
Description: Fraction of reads that map partially or wholly to a TRA gene segment.

Name: Mean Used Read Pairs per Cell
Description: Mean number of read pairs used in assembly per cell barcode. These reads must have a cell barcode, map to a V(D)J gene, and have a UMI with sufficient read support, counted after subsampling.

Name: Fraction Reads in Cells
Description: Number of reads with cell barcodes divided by the number of reads with valid barcodes.

Name: Median TRA UMIs per Cell
Description: Median number of UMIs assigned to a TRA contig per cell.

Name: Paired Clonotype Diversity
Description: Effective diversity of the paired clonotypes, computed as the Inverse Simpson Index of the clonotype frequencies. A value of 1 indicates a minimally diverse sample - only one distinct clonotype was detected. A value equal to the estimated number of cells indicates a maximally diverse sample.

Name: Cells With TRA Contig
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one TRA contig annotated as a full or partial V(D)J gene.

Name: Cells With CDR3-annotated TRA Contig
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one TRA contig where a CDR3 was detected.

Name: Cells With V-J Spanning Contig
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one full-length contig.

Name: Cells With V-J Spanning TRA Contig
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one full-length TRA contig.

Name: Cells With Productive TRA Contig
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one full-length TRA contig that is productive.

Name: Cells With Productive V-J Spanning Pair
Description: Fraction of cell barcodes with at least one contig for each chain of the receptor pair that is productive.
